metadata.description: A comprehensive personal website designed to establish a strong online presence for AI and mobile development expertise

tasks.title: Project Foundation Setup
tasks.description: Set up NextJS 14+ project foundation with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and MagicUI.Design component library
tasks.details:
- Configure NextJS 14+ with App Router
- Set up TypeScript with strict mode
- Install and configure Tailwind CSS
- Integrate MagicUI.Design component library
- Configure server-side rendering for public pages
- Set up proper project structure

tasks.title: Landing Page Development
tasks.description: Create SEO-optimized landing page with clear value proposition and performance optimization
tasks.details:
- Design and implement hero section with compelling value proposition
- Ensure page load time < 2.5s
- Target bounce rate < 40%
- Implement Core Web Vitals optimization (LCP < 2.5s, FID < 100ms, CLS < 0.1)
- Add structured data for SEO
- Implement meta tags and Open Graph

tasks.title: Portfolio Showcase System
tasks.description: Build dynamic portfolio showcase with case studies and project filtering
tasks.details:
- Create portfolio gallery with minimum 10 projects
- Implement filtering by technology/category
- Design detailed project case studies with outcomes
- Add client testimonials integration
- Ensure 2-second load time for portfolio section
- Implement image optimization and lazy loading

tasks.title: About Page Development
tasks.description: Develop professional About page with certifications and downloadable resume
tasks.details:
- Create comprehensive professional profile
- Showcase certifications and expertise areas
- Implement downloadable resume functionality
- Add skills and technology showcase
- Include professional timeline/journey
- Ensure mobile-first responsive design

tasks.title: Contact System Implementation
tasks.description: Implement multi-channel contact system with validation and form handling
tasks.details:
- Create contact form with robust validation
- Implement multiple contact methods integration
- Ensure 95%+ form submission success rate
- Add form submission confirmation system
- Include email notifications and auto-responses
- Implement spam protection and rate limiting

tasks.title: Consultation Booking System
tasks.description: Build integrated consultation booking system with calendar synchronization
tasks.details:
- Implement scheduling interface with available time slots
- Add calendar integration (Google Calendar, Outlook)
- Create booking confirmation and reminder system
- Target 80%+ booking completion rate
- Implement timezone handling for global clients
- Add consultation type selection and pricing

tasks.title: Blog Platform with Strapi CMS
tasks.description: Set up Strapi CMS for blog platform with SEO optimization
tasks.details:
- Configure Strapi headless CMS
- Create blog content types with SEO fields
- Implement rich text editor with media support
- Set up webhook integration for NextJS revalidation
- Configure image optimization and CDN integration
- Target publishing 2+ posts per month capability

tasks.title: WhatsApp Integration
tasks.description: Integrate WhatsApp Business API with channel join functionality
tasks.details:
- Implement WhatsApp channel join button
- Set up automated welcome message system
- Configure WhatsApp Business API integration
- Target 500+ subscribers within 60 days
- Create content broadcasting capabilities
- Implement subscriber management system

tasks.title: Analytics and Tracking Setup
tasks.description: Implement PostHog analytics with comprehensive conversion tracking
tasks.details:
- Set up PostHog for product analytics
- Implement event tracking for all key user actions
- Configure funnel analysis and user identification
- Ensure 100% event coverage for conversion actions
- Set up session recording and heatmaps
- Create analytics dashboard for monitoring KPIs

tasks.title: SEO Foundation and Optimization
tasks.description: Establish comprehensive SEO foundation with technical optimization
tasks.details:
- Implement meta tags and structured data markup
- Generate XML sitemap and robots.txt
- Configure Open Graph and Twitter Cards
- Ensure passing Google Rich Results Test
- Optimize for 90+ Lighthouse SEO score
- Implement canonical URLs and clean URL structure

tasks.title: Database and Authentication Setup
tasks.description: Configure Supabase database and authentication system
tasks.details:
- Set up Supabase PostgreSQL database
- Configure authentication with multiple providers
- Implement row-level security policies
- Set up user session management
- Create database schemas for users, consultations, and content
- Configure real-time subscriptions for dynamic features

tasks.title: Production Deployment and Infrastructure
tasks.description: Deploy to Vercel with CloudFlare CDN and performance optimization
tasks.details:
- Configure Vercel deployment with automatic GitHub integration
- Set up CloudFlare CDN for global edge caching
- Implement environment variable management
- Configure SSL/TLS encryption and security headers
- Set up monitoring and error tracking
- Ensure 99.9% uptime SLA capability

metadata.description: MVP development tasks for the Professional Portfolio & Consultation Platform

tasks.title: Digital Marketplace Development
tasks.description: Build Stripe-powered digital marketplace for product sales
tasks.details:
- Integrate Stripe Payment Element for secure checkout
- Create product catalog with descriptions and pricing
- Implement instant download delivery system
- Set up invoice generation and tax calculation
- Target processing 50+ transactions monthly
- Add purchase history and customer management

tasks.title: AI Assistant Integration
tasks.description: Implement AI assistant using Assistant-UI for visitor guidance
tasks.details:
- Integrate Assistant-UI chatbot component
- Configure AI-SDK for backend functionality with LangChain
- Implement streaming responses and conversation memory
- Target 70% query resolution rate
- Add escalation to human support option
- Configure rate limiting and cost optimization

tasks.title: Services Catalog Development
tasks.description: Create comprehensive services catalog with pricing and booking integration
tasks.details:
- Design detailed service offerings pages
- Implement clear pricing structure display
- Integrate with consultation booking system
- Add service comparison features
- Include FAQ sections for each service
- Ensure all services have clear pricing and process explanation

tasks.title: Subscription Management System
tasks.details:
- Set up RevenueCat for subscription lifecycle management
- Create 3+ subscription tiers with different features
- Implement customer portal for self-service management
- Add subscription analytics and metrics tracking
- Configure webhook integration for billing events
- Enable plan upgrades and downgrades

metadata.description: Phase 2 development tasks including digital marketplace, AI assistant, and advanced features
